p: Decisions concerning the route of childbirth also need to take into account individual characteristics. As usual, C-sections should be indicated depending on the maternal and fetal conditions ( 16) . Note that even amidst this pandemic, good practices concerning labor, birth and postpartum care should continue among women who are not suggestive of being infected or had a confirmed diagnosis of COVID-19, as well as women who have recovered from the infection ( 17) .
